verses.verse: Ὁ <WG3588> HO - ( The Road to Damascus) Δὲ <WG1161> De Meanwhile , Σαῦλος <WG4569> Saulos Saul ἔτι <WG2089> eti was still ἐμπνέων <WG1709> empneōn breathing out ἀπειλῆς <WG547> apeilēs threats καὶ <WG2532> kai - φόνου <WG5408> phonou murderous εἰς <WG1519> eis against τοὺς <WG3588> tous the μαθητὰς <WG3101> mathētas disciples τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord . προσελθὼν <WG4334> proselthōn He approached τῷ <WG3588> tō the ἀρχιερεῖ <WG749> archierei high priest

ᾐτήσατο <WG154> ētēsato and requested παρ’ <WG3844> par’ . . . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou . . . ἐπιστολὰς <WG1992> epistolas letters εἰς <WG1519> eis in Δαμασκὸν <WG1154> Damaskon Damascus , πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὰς <WG3588> tas the συναγωγάς <WG4864> synagōgas synagogues ὅπως <WG3704> hopōs so that ἐάν <WG1437> ean if τινας <WG5100> tinas any εὕρῃ <WG2147> heurē he found τῆς <WG3588> tēs to the Ὁδοῦ <WG3598> Hodou Way , ὄντας <WG1510> ontas belonging ἄνδρας <WG435> andras men τε <WG5037> te - καὶ <WG2532> kai [or] γυναῖκας <WG1135> gynaikas women δεδεμένους <WG1210> dedemenous he could bring them as prisoners ἀγάγῃ <WG71> agagē . . . εἰς <WG1519> eis to Ἰερουσαλήμ <WG2419> Ierousalēm Jerusalem .

Ἐν <WG1722> En on δὲ <WG1161> de - τῷ <WG3588> tō - πορεύεσθαι <WG4198> poreuesthai his journey , ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto [As] αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Saul] ἐγγίζειν <WG1448> engizein drew near τῇ <WG3588> tē - Δαμασκῷ <WG1154> Damaskō to Damascus ἐξαίφνης <WG1810> exaiphnēs suddenly τε <WG5037> te - αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him . περιήστραψεν <WG4015> periēstrapsen flashed around φῶς <WG5457> phōs a light ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven

καὶ <WG2532> kai - πεσὼν <WG4098> pesōn He fell ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi to τὴν <WG3588> tēn the γῆν <WG1093> gēn ground ἤκουσεν <WG191> ēkousen [and] heard φωνὴν <WG5456> phōnēn a voice λέγουσαν <WG3004> legousan say αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to him , Σαοὺλ <WG4549> Saoul “ Saul , Σαούλ <WG4549> Saoul Saul , τί <WG5101> ti why με <WG1473> me Me ? ” διώκεις <WG1377> diōkeis do you persecute

Εἶπεν <WG2036> Eipen [Saul] asked . δέ <WG1161> de - Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who εἶ <WG1510> ei are You , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie Lord ? ” Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - . ( TR includes “It is hard for you to kick against the goads.”) δέ <WG1161> de [He replied] Ἐγώ <WG1473> Egō “ I εἰμι <WG1510> eimi am Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus , ὃν <WG3739> hon whom σὺ <WG4771> sy you διώκεις <WG1377> diōkeis are persecuting , ”
